title: S{o}TA award winners?
content:
Does anyone have a link to a complete list of S{o}TA award winners? I can only find the winners for 2003, 2006, and 2007.

 [‹ Downloadable fonts thru Safari](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017203304/http:/typophile.com/node/37793 "Go to previous forum topic") [Just when you thought it might be safe to say "Comic Sans" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017203304/http:/typophile.com/node/38104 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett

comments.content: off the top of my head, Carter, Berlow, Benguiat, Frutiger, Zapf?

Si, you’re good!

2003 - Hermann Zapf - awards ceremony in Chicago, May 2003  
2004 - Ed Benguiat - awards ceremony in San Francisco, TypeCon2004, July  
2005 - Matthew Carter - awards ceremony in New York, TypeCon2005, July  
2006 - Adrian Frutiger - awards ceremony in Berne, Switzerland, August  
2007 - David Berlow - awards ceremony in Seattle, TypeCon2007, August

We’ll get more info on the SOTA site soon.
